# Bybit API Documentation

> 141 documentation files | ~246k tokens

## General Documentation

- [Authentication](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bybit/authentication.md): â€‹
- [Change Log](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bybit/change_log.md): - We have deprecated the Legacy Crypto Loan Borrow API, since the new crypto
- [Error Codes](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bybit/error_codes.md): |                               Code                               | Description                                                            ...
- [Network Connectivity](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bybit/network_connectivity.md): The V5 API brings uniformity and efficiency to Bybit's product lines, unifying
- [Rate Limits](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bybit/rate_limits.md): You are allowed to send 600 requests within a 5-second window per IP by
- [Response Formats](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bybit/response_formats.md): de-DEen-USes-ARes-ESes-MXfr-FRkk-KZid-IDuk-UAja-JPru-RUth-THpt-BRtr-TRvi-VNzh-TW
